title: Save 50% with late villa offers from ChicIbiza
text:
Save 50% with late villa offers from ChicIbiza Save 50% with late villa offers from ChicIbiza Details   14:30 Book a half-price luxury villa in Ibiza for the closing parties Luxury holiday rental firm Chic Ibiza Villas is offering 50% reductions on its remaining villas, for bookings on selected available dates over the next five weeks – from 23 September – 31 October, 2015. Guests wanting to experience Ibiza’s legendary closing parties should book one of these luxury properties, at half of the usual rate. 
VILLA MARIPOSA – down from €5,995 to €2,998 per week Make a saving of £2,195* on the retro Villa Mariposa in Salinas, near Ibiza Town, boats minimalist modern décor, a quaint pool, peaceful location and cool art & photography inside. Sleeping 10 it’s the perfect crash pad for a chic clientele. Priced at £220 per person per week, based on 9 sharing. MINIMAL LAB – down from €7495 to €3,747 per week Make a saving of £2,732* on this newly built, palace of Ibizan luxury – a homage to clean lines and cutting edge technology. The villa is situated in the quiet village of San Jordi in the Island’s Sa Carroca area and is only minutes from Playa d'en Bossa and the beaches of Salinas and Es Cavallet. Sleeping nine, Minimal Lab’s electronic curtains, automatic ceiling lights, large polarized glass windows, incredible views, en-suite Jacuzzi, private pool and large outdoor day beds will ensure guests truly experience the wow factor during their stay. Priced at £306 per person per week, based on nine sharing. CASA CAP PEP SIMÓ – down from €7995 to €3,997 per week Make a saving of £2,927* on this luxury Ibiza villa sleeping 10. Split over three levels, with its own private pool, games room, outdoor BBQ area and outstanding sea views, Can Pep Simo.is located close to Ibiza Town and Talamanca. Priced at £293 per person per week, based on 9 sharing. Related articles
